title: Lassoing the Moon
description: FROM NEW YORK TIMESBESTSELLING & AWARD-WINNING AUTHOR SELENA KITT ------------------ Leila knows she’s always been closer to Rich, since the man of the house left when he was just a baby. He’s been the man in her life forever--but now he’s really a man, and his coming-of-age is a test for both of them.
author: Selena Kitt
